title: Onboard a New Management Property
description: A new landlord has signed a property management agreement. The PM must set up the property in the system.

tasks.description: Create a new property profile in the management software with all relevant details (address, owner info, etc.).
tasks.expected_outcome: A new property record is successfully created.

tasks.description: Set up the property's bank account and financial ledgers for rent collection and expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Financial accounts for the new property are established in the system.

tasks.description: If the property is tenanted, enter all existing lease information and tenant details.
tasks.expected_outcome: All current lease data, including rent, deposits, and lease end dates, is accurately entered.
